abstract: Billionaire industrialist Jon M Huntsman Sr wants to help finance a cure for cancer through his Huntsman Cancer Institute, and for his son Jon Jr to be the next Republican candidate elected to the White House.
snippet: The billionaire industrialist Jon M. Huntsman Sr. wants to help finance a cure for cancer, and for his son to be elected to the White House.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)

lead_paragraph: The billionaire industrialist Jon M. Huntsman Sr. wants to help finance a cure for cancer, and for his son to be elected to the White House.

headline.main: A Billionaire With Distinct Ideas of Philanthropy, and Presidential Politics
headline.print_headline: A Billionaire Big on Giving, and on a Certain Candidate
